name: Mathos
headline: Ultimate AI Math Problem Solver to Revolutionize Personalized Learning
description:
Mathos AI (Formerly MathGPTPro) is the leading AI math solver that enables academic performance and productivity of both students and teachers. It has empowered over 1M students from over 200 countries in the past year, which turns the previously mission-impossible personalized learning into real. Our advanced math AI model achieves roughly 20% higher accuracy in mathematical and quantitative problem-solving capabilities then GPT4o. 

As we move forward, we will tackle the hardest problems in the educational sector, personalization, adaptive learning, and shortages of teachers, with our trial runs in schools. By automating grading, providing insightful analytics, and generating adaptive assignments, our model empowers teachers to understand what their students need and what should be provided accordingly.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:education; industry:generative-ai; industry:edtech; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Tianwei Yue, Founder
founders.description:
AI since 2015. RL & Robotics recently. Building language agents since 2022. Love research but ended up as boring MLE in tech companies (???).

I feel only doing research or building startups make me excited. If one more, milk tea. 
Admitted to college at age 14.

founders.name: Qi Lyu, Founder
founders.description:
AI/LLM + Full Stack Architect + Product.

1st Prize in China National Math Competition.

[Backed by![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/660d07878f93e78eee285191_output-onlinepngtools.png)](https://info.mathgptpro.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/mathgptpro>)
# AI Math Tutor 
**Loved by Students**
10M+ questions already asked by users from 200+ countries.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/65c43ae7ba39bd0ce7cdcbea_%E6%9C%AA%E6%A0%87%E9%A2%98-1%20\(1\).gif)
# Snap & Ask
Our app is live on the [Web](https://info.mathgptpro.com/<https:/mathgptpro.com/>), [Apple App Store](https://info.mathgptpro.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/mathgptpro/id6473790582>) and [Google Play](https://info.mathgptpro.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mathgptpro.mclient>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/660cf309dc88c6a24b7550da_1280X1280.PNG)
# Advanced Model
Our beta model solves math with 20%+ higher accuracy than GPT-4. ‍**Signup**[**here**](https://info.mathgptpro.com/<https:/forms.gle/DyuEnWR2nD49ZkF88>)**for early access!**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/660d0d53aeef411b63846404_Lark20240403-160254.gif)
[Get Started](https://info.mathgptpro.com/<https:/app.mathgptpro.com/>)
[](https://info.mathgptpro.com/<#>)
Interactive & Progressive Learning
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/660d1347443ae06816ae32a9_20240403-162833.png)
On-Demand interactive tutoring
Our AI offers instant hints to guide you to understand, or socratic questions to inspire your critical thinking**.**
AI tracks learning progress
Our AI tracks students’ learning progress by knowledge graph profilings. It knows what students are struggling with, and will help them find the best problems to work on.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/660d137f5b2a189b7f1991b3_Group%20304.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/660d10c7655e7561a5b7ef43_20240403-160909.png)
Learning should be fun and engaging
Motivate students through bit-sized tasks and awards.
Help Teachers, Help Students
AI scales up one-on-one tutoring experiences. No one is left behind.
Help teachers to reduce workload and focus
AI makes homework assessment a breeze for teachers. AI grades homework and guides students to understand their mistakes. By scaling up such one-on-one tutoring experience, AI saves teachers time and effort.
Help teachers to deliver knowledge effectively
When students are stuck on a question, AI will search lecture videos, slides, writeups to hint relevant key concepts, so that students access study materials easily.
No one is left behind
AI summarizes students’ progress to help teachers address individuality. Speed learners grow faster, while others can receive extra care. 
Find-Yourself
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/660d4aafe45329a8020993a2_5%20\(4\).svg)
Mentoring made personalized
Based on past learning history, our AI profiles students’ intellectual strengths, interests and personalities. Teachers can now focus more on mentoring: guiding students’ career directions and helping them to find themselves. 
Future of Education
Embrace new tools towards personalized and accessible learning.
AI is capable of many things effortlessly, while humans need to go through a learning curve for every task. How shall we survive given rapidly changing technology? Learning how to **think** and adapt is the key. We encourage both students and teachers to **embrace** AI as a tool to get inspiration and boost productivity.We believe AI will bring education to the next level. We want to dismantle educational barriers, we are envisioning a future where quality, affordable, and personalized learning experiences are accessible to all people at any time.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c07ba51b67fbfec96d1d6c/65c64a22ed4231c4e1ba01b1_MathgptFullLogo.svg)](https://info.mathgptpro.com/</>)
AI is transforming education, and we want support this!

generated_description:
### Mathos: Revolutionizing Personalized Learning Through AI

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2023 and based in Santa Clara, CA, Mathos—originally known as MathGPTPro—aims to transform education with its advanced AI math problem-solving capabilities. The company's mission is to create the ultimate AI math tutor, designed to personalize learning experiences for students while boosting the productivity of teachers. 

**Key Accomplishments:**  
In just one year, Mathos has supported over **1 million students** across **200 countries**, proving that personalized learning isn’t just a dream—it’s a reality. Their AI model outperforms competitors, achieving approximately **20% higher accuracy** than the renowned GPT-4 in math and quantitative problem-solving. 

**Educational Impact:**  
Mathos's vision is ambitious: tackling critical issues in education, such as personalization, adaptive learning, and teacher shortages. They’re piloting their technology in schools, focusing on automating grading, offering insightful analytics, and tailoring assignments to meet individual student needs. Imagine every student receiving the attention they require, with teachers equipped to guide their progress effectively.

**Product Features:**  
1. **On-Demand Tutoring:** The AI provides instant hints and employs Socratic questioning to encourage critical thinking.
2. **Learning Tracking:** It keeps tabs on each student's learning journey by creating knowledge graphs, identifying where they struggle, and recommending relevant problems.
3. **Teacher Tools:** Mathos helps teachers by grading homework and suggesting resources when students encounter difficulties, ensuring no one falls behind.
4. **Personalized Profiles:** The system develops profiles based on a student's learning history, strengths, and interests, enabling teachers to act more as mentors.

**Vision for the Future:**  
Mathos believes that education should be accessible and engaging for everyone. By dismantling barriers with technology, they envision a world where high-quality, affordable education is within reach for all learners. Their goal? To encourage an environment where both students and teachers can thrive, leveraging AI as a powerful ally in the learning process.

**Team and Backing:**  
With a lean team of **five employees** and supported by Y Combinator's **Batch W24**, Mathos is well-positioned to make an impact in the edtech space. Nicolas Dessaigne serves as a group partner, further enriching their expertise.

**Join the Journey:**  
If you’re curious about how AI can reshape education, Mathos invites you to explore their [website](https://info.mathgptpro.com/) or try their offerings today.

In short, Mathos isn't just about solving math problems—they're about solving the future of education. And that’s something worth paying attention to.
